channel.title: 文献阅读 on 非淡泊无以明志，非宁静无以致远。
channel.description: Recent content in 文献阅读 on 非淡泊无以明志，非宁静无以致远。

item.title: Genetic and non-genetic indirect effects for harvest weight in the GIFT strain of Nile tilapia (Oreochromis niloticus) note
item.description: 重点关注收获体重IGE与存活的相关性解释。 摘要 关于间接遗传效应的定义，英文标准定义为“The heritable effect of an individual on the trait values of other individuals it interacts with is known as an indirect genetic effect (IGE) ”

item.title: Is continued genetic improvement of livestock sustainable-阅读笔记
item.description: Hill William G. Is continued genetic improvement of livestock sustainable? Genetics, 2016, 202:977-881. 摘要 作者认为，很少遗传变异已经丢失，连续遗传改良是可持续的，没有问题的。 ps：但是从商业角度看，并不是遗传变异丢失
